General.Name: Beijing Yuanliu Hongyuan Electronic Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Yuanliu Hongyuan Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of electronic components in China and internationally. It operates through Self-Produced Business and Agency Business segments. The Self-Produced Business segment offers ceramic capacitors and filters which are used in aerospace, aviation, electronic information, weapons, and ships, as well as civilian fields comprising 5G communications, rail transit, and medical electronics. The Agency Business segment primarily offer capacitors, resistors, inductors, radio frequency and discrete devices, connectors, integrated circuits, and other electronic components which are used for industrial and consumer civilian markets including new energy, automotive electronics, rail transit, smart grid, 5G communications, consumer electronics, medical electronics, industrial/artificial intelligence, Internet of Things, and other fields. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

1.Name: Ms. Xiaodan  Zheng
1.Title: Vice Chairman & Deputy Director of Marketing Center
